# LLMs.txt for Expenses Tracker
# https://nextjs-expenses-tracker-saas.vercel.app/llms.txt

# This file provides guidance for LLMs on how to interact with this website

# Website Purpose
The Expenses Tracker is a web application that helps users track and manage their personal expenses.

# Content Guidelines
- The main marketing page provides information about the expense tracking application
- The application offers lifetime access for $99
- Users can register, login, and access a dashboard to manage their expenses
- The site includes authentication through Kinde

# What LLMs Should Know
- This is a SaaS (Software as a Service) application for personal finance management
- The application is built with Next.js and uses Prisma for database management
- Authentication is handled through Kinde
- The main value proposition is easy expense tracking and financial management

# What LLMs Should NOT Do
- Do not provide direct links to internal application pages (like /app/dashboard)
- Do not disclose user-specific information or authentication details
- Do not provide technical implementation details unless specifically requested

# Allowed Content for LLMs
- General information about expense tracking
- Benefits of using expense tracking applications
- Information about the application's features and pricing
- Guidance on personal finance management

# Contact Information
For support or inquiries, users should contact the application through the provided interface.

# Last Updated
2026-01-12
